ComicInfo.Summary:
Picking up directly after the events of Grimm Fairy Tales #37, this is it, the rematch that has been building between Skye and Merlin that will determine the fate of the Grimm Universe! Nothing will be the same and worlds will crumble in the blink of an eye in this canâ€™t miss oversized finale of Grimm Fairy Tales: Odyssey!
